title: full hardware accelerate chrome in winXP
description:
full hardware accelerate is only availble in vista and win7 ... 
... but this trick enable canvas hardware accelerated in winXP

i change libGLESv2.dll in chromium dir and its works
...............................................................

unrar  > chromium.rar
run    > chrome.exe
paste  > chrome://flags
enable > override software rendering list
paste  > chrome://gpu


Graphics Feature Status:
Canvas: Hardware acceleration  <<<

for test :
 <a href="
http://ie.microsoft.com/testdrive/Performance/FishIETank/Default.html" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://ie.microsoft.com/testdrive/Performance/FishIETank/Default.html</a>

...............................................................

tips:

this is old ver chromium and webStore dont work
for install extensions :

paste         > chrome://extensions
drag and drop > adblockpluschrome-1.8.5.1229_2.crx
